mapper.insert: INSERT INTO advertising ( adname, adType, shopId, shopName, cover, display ) VALUES ( #{advertis.adname}, #{advertis.adType}, #{advertis.shopId}, #{advertis.shopName}, #{advertis.cover}, #{advertis.display} )

mapper.update: update advertising set display = false where id = #{id}
